text:
When work and home CRASH... vividly!
  Another Day At The Office  -  https://t.co/if0OkmBGjq 
Intense dramatic insight
Hope you're not too squeamish
**Recognised in The Plough Prize for Poetry**
#mustread #poetry #WritingCommunity #writers #NHS #coronavirus #COVID19 #vaccine https://t.co/fo19qZrYTs
